title: On-Site Science Training Program for Astronauts: Immersive Learning-Based Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Theories of Earth and Space Science and Laboratory Research Experience
context.additional_context: Program focused on cultivating field sensibility and problem-solving skills for planetary exploration science missions. Conducted as a blended virtual/field activity in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can independently plan and execute field investigations in Mars-analog terrain at least three times
Learners can apply scientific sampling procedures using five or more geological specimen collection tools in an EVA (extravehicular activity) simulation environment
Learners can collaborate with interdisciplinary team members to solve two complex scientific problems and present results in report format
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
